data.title: Untitled Woody Allen Movie Open Casting Call in NYC
data.meta_description: Untitled Woody Allen Movie Open Casting Call in NYC - Find casting calls, news and more. Read the latest about Untitled Woody Allen Movie Open Casting Call in NYC and related on Project Casting.
data.text:
Casting directors are now casting extras for Woody Allen's new movie.

Woody Allen's new movie, which has been filming in Los Angeles, California for the last couple of weeks, is moving to New York City. On Tuesday, the new film was spotted shooting at the Vista Theater in Los Feliz and the TCL Chinese Theater in Hollywood. In addition, according to OLV, the movie's stars, Kristen Stewart and Jesse Eisenberg, filmed a romantic scene on the beach in Malibu, California.

Casting directors for Woody Allen's new movie is now looking for background actors and extras to work on the upcoming feature film.

Details surrounding the Woody Allen movie have not been released however, the movie is set in the 1950's and also features Blake Lively, Parker Posey, Jeannie Berlin, Corey Stoll, Anna Camp, Steve Carell and Paul Schnieder.

According to the latest casting calls, Woody Allen will be filming for the next four days in New York City starting around September 14th through the 17th.

Kee Casting, the extras casting director behind the new Woody Allen movie, is currently looking for a ton of background extras to work on the movie. Producers are looking for socialites, elegant types, teens, and Hollywood starlets for the upcoming scenes.

For more details check out the casting call breakdowns below, to audition for a role make sure to register with Kee Casting by emailing [email protected]

Woody Allen's New Movie Casting Call

WOODY ALLEN 2015 MOVIE

SET IN 1935 LA AND NYC

We have very specific requirement for who we cas

WOMEN:

all colors of hair- NO highlights?Hair can be chin length ( with a few exceptions shorter) and no longer than touching the shoulders..NO LONG HAIR. We are very serious about this. You can not show up at a fitting with LONG HAIR. It's not acceptable.

For the most part women will need to be on the small size.?Please know your correct measurements. Many of the ?clothes for our pretty young women have to have smallish busts?and waists. All the costumes run smaller than today!! We are sure you all know that. We can not fit very short women or very tall women.

There will be some character type older women and will have some larger sizes.. hair must be same as notes above.

MEN:

All have to agree to a haircut. You need to have enough hair to cut so don't do any haircuts now. It's not extreme but no sideburns

Mustaches are okay but must be willing to have mustache shaped?for the period.

No other facial hair allowed, sorry.

Please know your sizes including hat, glove.

Lots of Tuxedos( can not wear your own) and they are a very slim waist silhouette?If you have own dress shoes, patent leather great.

Will have some larger sizes for some character types. Generally men have to be average heights. The clothes do not work for men over 6'1 or 6'2

There are some multiple day scenes but people will be switched out as the days progress.

I often hear from men that you won't have haircut for one days work. I understand and am sorry if we won't be able to use you. There will be lots of single day scenes.

TATTOOS- nothing visible for men or women. Women can not have any on arms, upper back or legs.

EVERYONE WILL BE ASKED TO SEND A SELFIE ON THE DAY WE CONTACT YOU ABOUT POSSIBLE WORK. Do not send anything now please..
